Class HelpFormatterBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.scivicslab.pluggablecli.HelpFormatterBuilder
public class HelpFormatterBuilder extends Object
Builder capturing layout configuration for HelpFormatter. The builder stores an ordered list of sections and formatting parameters (width, indentation) that are materialised into a formatter instance just before rendering.

Ported from UtilityCliHelpFormatterBuilder (Utility-cli) with package relocation.
